19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Clean a car interior while managing access and gathering cleaning tools.

episodes.name: Clean car interior
episodes.description: The person picks up a mop-stick and sweeps the car floor, manages the door, and places tools and a cloth appropriately.

episodes.name: Gather cleaning tools
episodes.description: The person moves to a cabinet, opens it, picks up a cloth, moves to a wall, and picks a mop-stick from the wall.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Shut down, store, then set up and use a laptop with external keyboard and mouse.

episodes.name: Type and press
episodes.description: The person types on the laptop and presses a laptop button.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare onions and start cooking by washing them, loading and filling a pot, cutting/peeling, and heating on the cooker.

episodes.name: Wash onion
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, washes the onion under water, then turns the tap off.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: The person organizes tools, packs a box, performs tightening tasks on nuts/bolts, and handles a wheel removal/adjustment sequence.

episodes.name: Select and place tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and places a wrench, plier, and spanner using hand1.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Prepare and join wood pieces by clamping, drilling pilot holes, and positioning screws for assembly.

episodes.name: Drive initial screw
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and screw, positions the screw on the wood, drives it in, then sets the tools down and releases the hold.

episodes.name: Clamp and adjust wood
episodes.description: The person picks up a clamp, positions it on the wood, tightens it, loosens it, and removes it from the wood.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Organize and clean a bookshelf by rearranging books, removing dust, and inspecting books.

episodes.name: Pre-clean sorting
episodes.description: The person rearranges books, moving them between the floor and bookshelf, aligns them, and removes one book.

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Prepare the machine and install and tighten bolts using a screwdriver while stabilizing with the other hand.

episodes.name: Bolt 1 installation
episodes.description: The person taps the machine with a hammer, then positions a bolt on the machine and tightens it with a screwdriver while stabilizing with the other hand.

episodes.name: Bolt 2 installation
episodes.description: The person sets down the screwdriver, then positions another bolt on the machine and tightens it with the screwdriver while stabilizing with the other hand.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Attach and secure fabric onto furniture by cutting, gluing, nailing, and trimming.

episodes.name: Initial Cutting
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors, holds the fabric, cuts it, then sets down the scissors and releases the fabric.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Prepare and fold paper, align a metal board, attach cardboard, and apply glue with a brush.

episodes.name: Board alignment
episodes.description: The person picks up a metal board, places it onto paper, and adjusts it with both hands.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Examine cards on a table by tapping, picking them up to check, and placing them back down.

episodes.name: On-table probing
episodes.description: The person touches and taps a card resting on the table with hand1.

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Assemble and secure motorcycle parts by positioning components and tightening screws, bolts, and nuts with hand tools.

episodes.name: Initial preparation
episodes.description: The person prepares the motorcycle by folding a tag, adjusting the tyre, and rotating the wheel.

5293587a-e6c4-4760-8277-cf284588aac3.overall_goal: Clean dishes using water and soap, then organize them on the drying rack and store them in their proper places.

episodes.name: Rinse and rack
episodes.description: The person manages the tap, pre-rinses items from the sink, scrubs spoon and saucer with a sponge, rinses, and places them on the drying rack.

episodes.name: Soap, wash, store
episodes.description: They apply soap to the sponge, scrub and rinse a cup and place it on the rack, move dried items to shelf and drawer, then wash and rinse a mug.

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Wash and dry a bowl and a mug at the sink using a towel, then return cleaned items to the table.

episodes.name: Bowl washing
episodes.description: The person opens the tap, holds the bowl, washes and rinses it, then closes the tap.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Assemble machine parts by preparing tools, securing a bolt to the engine, applying glue, and moving a ring toward the machine.

episodes.name: Prepare tools
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush and a container, dips the brush into the container, sets the container down, and picks up a wrench.

episodes.name: Fasten and apply
episodes.description: They place and hold a bolt on the engine, tighten it with a wrench, release it, clean the other hand with a tissue, apply glue to a bolt using the brush, put tools down, pick up a ring, and move toward the machine.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble a bicycle by installing the pedal and brake, connecting and adjusting the brake cable, positioning the frame, and mounting wheels while tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Install Pedal
episodes.description: The person attaches the pedal to the bicycle frame and secures its bolt with a wrench.

a5a0a366-8721-413f-8412-66cf69b23b18.overall_goal: Retrieve dishes and utensils, clean them with a cloth, and return them to the cupboard and drawer.

episodes.name: Cupboard Setup
episodes.description: The person opens the cupboard, stows a cloth inside, and closes it.

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare dough pieces by mixing, kneading, rolling, cutting, placing in a pan, and brushing with oil.

episodes.name: Mix bowl contents
episodes.description: The person picks up a spatula, mixes the bowlâ€™s contents, and puts the spatula down.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare and shape dough by mixing ingredients, then kneading, rolling, and cutting it.

episodes.name: Add flour
episodes.description: The person picks up flour from a shelf, carries it, pours it into the mixer, and places the container on the table.

episodes.name: Mix and shape dough
episodes.description: The person adds sugar and water, operates the mixer, takes out the dough, repeatedly kneads and adjusts it, brings a pan, rolls the dough, cuts it with a knife, and places the knife on the table.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare a baking setup by managing the oven and tray, assembling ingredients in a bowl, covering it, transferring dough to a tray, and mixing with water.

episodes.name: Oven and tray setup
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, handles a tray into it, closes the oven, and sets the timer.

episodes.name: Wipe countertop
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the countertop, and puts the cloth down.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Paint a door frame while preparing and managing the paint can and protected floor area.

episodes.name: Begin painting frame
episodes.description: The person dips the brush into the paint can, holds the door frame with the other hand, and paints the frame, repeating dip-and-paint.

episodes.name: Prepare area, manage can
episodes.description: The person releases the door, spreads plastic wrap on the floor, places and opens the paint can, briefly dips and sets down the brush, then reinstalls and presses the lid and places the can on the wrap.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: release, pick-up, spread, place, remove, dip, put-down, press

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Wash a car using a hose, sponge, and towel.

episodes.name: Position and rinse
episodes.description: The person positions the bucket, manages the hose, rinses the car, and sets items down.

a0d6bd8e-c477-442b-bab3-731775b44b43.overall_goal: Wash a car by preparing water, rinsing, scrubbing with a sponge, and finishing up.

episodes.name: Setup and pre-rinse
episodes.description: The person handles a towel, opens the tap to fill a bucket, carries it to the car, briefly sprays the car, and prepares the sponge by dipping it in the bucket.

episodes.name: Scrub and finish
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, scrubs and moves the sponge on the car with periodic re-dips, then lowers the wiper to finish.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: lower

3c80ddb5-5046-4d97-9162-5e5a87ccb2fd.overall_goal: Gather, use, and stow tools to service a car bolt.

episodes.name: Access toolbox
episodes.description: The person opens the toolbox and picks up a wrench from it.

episodes.name: Stage tools and area
episodes.description: The person stabilizes the bolt, repositions the toolbox near the car, and fetches tools from the cabinet.

episodes.name: Load toolbox
episodes.description: The person places the wrench and screwdriver into the toolbox.

episodes.name: Store and service bolt
episodes.description: The person closes storage, stows the toolbox, then loosens, removes, replaces, and tightens the bolt using the wrench.

05c937ff-816b-46b8-8ae2-864eae85e987.overall_goal: Prepare, refine, and adjust a stand on a table using both hands and sandpaper.

episodes.name: Align and remove
episodes.description: The person grips the stand with both hands, rotates and aligns it on the table, then removes a part from the stand.

episodes.name: Inspect and sand
episodes.description: The person inspects the stand, holds it with one hand while picking up sandpaper with the other to smoothen the stand repeatedly, then places the sandpaper and the stand on the table and finally adjusts the stand with both hands.

4f68183f-610a-44de-b102-e7f300b49dcd.overall_goal: Prepare dough by mixing, kneading, and adding ingredients into a bowl.

episodes.name: Cover the bowl
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth from the countertop and covers the bowl with it using hand1.

3c18ec5c-7e6b-400d-9260-70598e04a373.overall_goal: Repot a plant by placing it in a pot, adding soil, and tidying the area.

episodes.name: Pot Setup
episodes.description: The person picks up a pot and places it on the table.

episodes.name: Planting and Cleanup
episodes.description: The person plants the plant into the pot, adds soil by pouring and scooping with a trowel, closes and places the bag aside, cleans the table, and finishes by adding more soil.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Pot a plant by placing it in a planter and adding soil with a trowel.

episodes.name: Plant and fill
episodes.description: The person places and adjusts the plant in the planter, then repeatedly scoops soil from a bag with a trowel and pours it into the planter before putting the trowel down.

episodes.name: Top up soil
episodes.description: After releasing the soil bag, the person continues scooping soil with the trowel and pouring it into the planter, then releases the planter.

episodes.name: Reset and finish
episodes.description: The person sets the trowel down, picks it up again, holds the soil bag for another scoop, then releases the bag and holds the planter.

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric and service fasteners on a door, replacing a nut and tightening components using hand tools.

episodes.name: Attach fabric, adjust bolt
episodes.description: The person picks up fabric, attaches it on the door, grabs a screwdriver, holds the bolt, adjusts it with the screwdriver, then puts the screwdriver onto the platform.

episodes.name: Loosen, swap, tighten
episodes.description: The person releases the bolt, uses a wrench and spanner to loosen and tighten, manages the nut by placing it into and picking it from the toolbox, inserts the nut, and finishes tightening with the wrench.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Loosen the plugâ€™s nut and extract the wire from the plug using a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Prepare and loosen
episodes.description: The person picks up a plug and a screwdriver from the table and starts loosening the nut in the plug.

5bc29170-aa13-4dd7-bb48-2790f676463c.overall_goal: Repair an electrical cable connection: cut and test the cable, twist and insulate the wires, tighten the terminal, and cycle power off and on.

episodes.name: Initial wire cut
episodes.description: The person picks up the wire from the wall, retrieves a knife, cuts the wire, and sets the items down.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Harvest leaves from a plant using pruning-sheer and collect them into a basket.

episodes.name: Position Basket
episodes.description: The person picks up and carries the basket with both hands and places it on the ground.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Install, adjust, and verify a gauge on a motorcycle wheel by preparing parts, assembling components, mounting on the wheel, and aligning the setup.

episodes.name: Preparation and setup
episodes.description: The person opens a pack, tightens a screw on the gauge with a screwdriver, cleans the gauge, performs brief metal work with a hammer, moves a carton, and retrieves a screw.

episodes.name: Insert and tune gauge
episodes.description: Holding the gauge, the person inserts a screw into it and uses pliers to examine and adjust before putting down the pliers and releasing the gauge.

episodes.name: Mount and align assembly
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench, mounts and tightens the gauge on the wheel, taps for adjustment, aligns and cleans the wheel, manipulates the motorcycle for positioning, and examines the final gauge setup.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Actions: hold, fix, tighten, put-down, pick-up, hit, adjust, release, clean, check, pull, move, examine

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare, season, and bake shaped dough into bread.

episodes.name: Dough Shaping Prep
episodes.description: The person manipulates the doughâ€”dipping, twisting, shaping, rollingâ€”and arranges it on the table and tray.

episodes.name: Apply Egg Wash
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, brushes the dough with egg wash, and puts the brush down on the table.

episodes.name: Season and Bake
episodes.description: The person sprinkles salt on the dough, carries the tray to the oven, places it inside, closes the oven door, and sets the timer.

c1ef9d03-1278-4216-b1e4-b1a298a892d9.overall_goal: Scrape and cut dough at the table, then transfer dough strips onto a tray.

episodes.name: Move to table
episodes.description: The person moves to the table.

episodes.name: Prep and cut dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a scraper, scrapes dough from the table, places a tray on the rack, then holds the dough and cuts it into strips before setting the scraper down.

episodes.name: Transfer strips to tray
episodes.description: The person releases the dough, picks up a dough strip with both hands, carries it to the tray, and drops it in.

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Clean multiple kitchen items at the sink, then dry and store them, wipe the counter, and tidy the sink area.

episodes.name: Wash sieve and plate
episodes.description: The person washes and completes the cleaning of the sieve, then starts washing a plate under running water.

episodes.name: Rinse plate, stage dishes
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the plate, then moves a pizza tray and plates from the table to the sink.

episodes.name: Stage sieve, wash pan
episodes.description: The person stages the sieve into the sink, then turns on the tap and washes a pan with a sponge.

episodes.name: Rinse pan, store and tidy
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the pan, stores clean items in the cupboard, wipes the counter, and washes the sink.

episodes.name: Finish sink and pizza tray
episodes.description: The person turns off water and dries the sink, stages a pan to the sink, then washes, rinses, and dries the pizza tray.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.description: Actions: wash

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.description: Actions: turn-off, put-down, pick-up, dry, carry, turn-on, hold, wash

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.description: Actions: rinse, turn-off, pick-up, dry, put-down

583ff0cb-4697-4f63-b525-bf5bc2318117.overall_goal: Prepare, bake, and process dough and bread using the oven, rolling surface, and a dough machine.

episodes.name: Flour, Knead, Load Oven
episodes.description: The person sprinkles flour, kneads the dough, manages the oven to remove bread and load dough, sets the timer, starts the oven, and repositions dough on the table.

episodes.name: Rolling Setup
episodes.description: The person prepares the rolling pin on the table and rolls the dough with both hands.

episodes.name: Machine Setup and Run
episodes.description: The person carries a tray to the dough machine, places it on a nearby shelf, and operates the machine.

f35817ce-c97c-4795-b92d-bfd71aa3c7de.overall_goal: Service a motorbike by installing and securing components, including placing parts and tightening/loosening fasteners with a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Initial bolt install
episodes.description: The person positions the bike, places a bolt, holds the bike, tightens the bolt with a screwdriver, then sets the tool down and releases the bike.

episodes.name: Loosen a screw
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver, holds the bike, and untightens a screw.

episodes.name: Cover and final assembly
episodes.description: The person releases the bike, removes a loosened screw, installs a cover and tightens its screws, fetches a bolt from a box, places it on the bike, holds the bike, tightens the bolt, and releases the bike.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, remove, put-down, pick-up, place, tighten

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Care for a potted plant by cleaning, grooming, positioning, fertilizing, watering, and trimming.

episodes.name: Clean the pot
episodes.description: The person wipes the pot using a cloth and then sets the cloth and pot down.

56ddd3b9-5598-4f87-8a90-3f7c810d3e74.overall_goal: Remove the motorbike wheel, service and secure it, then reattach it and verify proper alignment and rotation.

episodes.name: Loosen wheel fasteners
episodes.description: The person uses a wrench, screwdriver, and hammer to unscrew bolts and screws on the wheel and loosen it, placing tools back on the workbench.

episodes.name: Mount wheel on vice
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel off the motorbike, places it on a vice, and uses a wrench to screw in bolts before setting the wrench down.

episodes.name: Reattach and finalize
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel from the vice, attaches it to the motorbike, tightens bolts with a wrench, then inspects, adjusts, and checks alignment and rotation.

c9a6233c-7a8b-488c-b0ab-bce963c643bd.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a chair by preparing joints, inserting screws, and tightening fasteners with tools.

episodes.name: Prepare and tap joint
episodes.description: The person moves a carton, picks up tools, holds the chair joint, taps it with a hammer, then puts the hammer down and releases the joint.

episodes.name: Insert and tighten screws
episodes.description: The person uses a screwdriver to tighten screws, sets it on a platform, inserts a screw into the chair, then picks the screwdriver back up to tighten and finally drops it on the platform.

episodes.name: Reposition and tighten bolt
episodes.description: The person adjusts the chair grip, holds and pulls it, then tightens a bolt on the chair using a spanner.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, pull, tighten

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: Prepare and bake dough while also combining flour and water into a mixture.

episodes.name: Scraper dough prep
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds the dough, cuts it with the scrapper, then puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Roll and stretch
episodes.description: The person releases the dough and repeatedly rolls and stretches it with both hands.

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Organize the workspace, perform scraping on wood, and clean the floor by arranging items and using tools like a scraper, broom, and dustpan.

episodes.name: Prep and scrape
episodes.description: The person organizes supplies, stores items, puts on a glove, scrapes wood with a scraper, then sets the scraper down and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Organize and clean
episodes.description: The person arranges a rod and ladder, scrubs and sweeps the floor, collects dust with a dustpan, and puts tools down.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, place, hold, scrub, put-down, sweep, collect

26b635ab-134a-477c-a22e-e805eed07a9d.overall_goal: Prepare a soapy sponge and wash dishware (plate and spoon), then place them on a drying rack.

episodes.name: Prep cleaning tools
episodes.description: The person equips and primes tools by wearing a glove, wetting the sponge, applying soap, setting items down, then removing and placing the glove aside.

8cf5a53b-fa9c-4fe7-b767-697133d4d5b8.overall_goal: Set up a painting workspace, paint the book using a brush, then rinse and put away the tools.

episodes.name: Setup and paint
episodes.description: The person places a canvas on an easel, prepares paint on a palette, and paints the book with a paintbrush.

episodes.name: Rinse and tidy
episodes.description: The person sets down the palette, rinses and swirls the paintbrush in water, wipes it with a cloth, and puts the brush down.

4988de48-c77e-406d-8367-68fe2266a8aa.overall_goal: Produce a finished wood sculpture through iterative carving, adjustment, and finishing steps using hand tools and a machine.

episodes.name: Initial carve and inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a chisel, carves the wood, inspects the result, and sets the chisel down.

episodes.name: Shaping and handling
episodes.description: The person adjusts the machine and sculpture, repeatedly handles the chisel to shave the wood, wipes dust, examines progress, transfers the tool, and places it down.

episodes.name: Clamping and finishing
episodes.description: The person secures the work, measures and marks the wood, performs final carving, then smoothens and brushes off dust.

aa8fcce0-75d1-485f-aede-5d9e6997ad41.overall_goal: Clean the car interior and floor mat, including handling supplies and preparing a cleaning cloth.

episodes.name: Seat prep and clean
episodes.description: The person handles keys, manages trash, opens/unlocks the car, and cleans the seat with a cloth.

episodes.name: Mat clean and prep
episodes.description: The person removes and brushes the mat, places it back, then retrieves supplies from a bag and pours liquid onto a cloth.

6cfe67ef-f0cc-47f0-8808-31efcf876095.overall_goal: Assemble and secure screws on a furniture piece, verify alignment and stability, then put tools away.

episodes.name: Gather and position
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and two screws, then positions the screws on the furniture piece.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare a cold sweet drink in a cup by fetching items, adding ice and sugar, and stirring.

episodes.name: Retrieve fridge bottle
episodes.description: The person opens the fridge, picks a bottle, closes the fridge, and places the bottle on the counter.

episodes.name: Prep tools and stir
episodes.description: The person retrieves and rinses a spoon, handles a cup and drink, and stirs the drink before setting the spoon down.

episodes.name: Add ice cubes
episodes.description: The person opens the freezer, retrieves an ice tray, removes ice cubes, and adds them into the cup before closing the freezer.

episodes.name: Pour and sweeten
episodes.description: The person pours liquid from a bottle into the cup, opens a jar, scoops sugar, adds it into the cup, and places items back on the counter.

d04f8465-d11f-40d1-8315-302380ec0af4.overall_goal: Modify a pen and its cover using a cutter, then inspect the pen.

episodes.name: Modify pen and cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cutter and cover, cuts the cover, attaches it to the pen, manipulates and removes the cover, and sets down the items.

episodes.name: Cut and inspect pen
episodes.description: The person holds the pen, cuts it with the cutter, sets the cutter down, and inspects the pen.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Remove a rope tied around a plant after inspecting and preparing the area, then dispose of the rope and clean up.

episodes.name: Inspect plant and rope
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant, clears debris, positions the plant, examines the rope on it, and secures a grip on the rope.

episodes.name: Set plant down
episodes.description: The person places the plant down to prepare for untying the rope.

episodes.name: Untie and remove rope
episodes.description: The person unties, loosens, and untangles the rope from the plant, removes and places it on the ground, collects it, stores it in a container, and wipes their hands.

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Disassemble a fence section, store the hardware, pack up the tools, and untie a rope.

episodes.name: Move fence board
episodes.description: The person lifts and carries a fence-board and places it on the ground.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Arrange the dining table and prepare a tray with cups and plates for service.

episodes.name: Arrange tableware
episodes.description: The person arranges cups, plates, and a dish on the dining table and adjusts their positions.

e8e54409-495b-49e5-b325-556c812d6ff4.overall_goal: Wash, rinse, dry, and store dishes under a running tap.

episodes.name: Setup and prep
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, prepares the sponge with soap, and puts the soap down.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Perform camera maintenance by cleaning the camera and managing its cover using a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Initial Cleaning
episodes.description: The person picks up a wipe, cleans the camera (including inside), then wipes the camera while handling it and places both the wipe and camera back on the table.

episodes.name: Attach Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up the cover, places it onto the camera, then uses a screwdriver to screw it in and sets the tool down.

episodes.name: Clean and Unscrew
episodes.description: The person holds the camera, cleans it with a wipe, then unscrews the cover using a screwdriver and puts the tools down.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Load laundry into the washing machine and add detergent.

episodes.name: Bring laundry basket
episodes.description: The person picks up the laundry basket, carries it to the washing machine, and sets it down next to it.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Refill a carâ€™s fluid reservoir by fetching water in a bucket from a tap and transporting it to the car.

episodes.name: Initial pour and check
episodes.description: The person picks up a bucket, goes to the tap, positions it, briefly checks the car, pours some water into a car container, sets the bucket down, and inspects the container.

303505b9-2cf3-488d-ae5f-d72d3bf73585.overall_goal: Create, attach, and finish a cardboard piece for a model train by cutting, gluing cloth, aligning, and painting.

episodes.name: Cut and prep
episodes.description: The person cuts and trims the cardboard, test-fits it on the model train, applies glue, and returns the piece to the table.

episodes.name: Attach cloth
episodes.description: The person places cloth onto the glued cardboard, presses it down, then picks up the cardboard and aligns it on the train.

episodes.name: Reapply glue
episodes.description: The person picks up glue with the other hand, applies more glue to the cardboard, and sets the glue back on the table.

episodes.name: Press and paint
episodes.description: The person presses the piece onto the train, examines the craft, then paints the cardboard while holding it and puts the brush down.

92af2e29-8b4c-4a37-bb48-f3b3e4d1901a.overall_goal: Deep-clean the car floor mat and return it neatly to the car.

episodes.name: Open car door
episodes.description: The person opens the car door to access the mat.

episodes.name: Clean and replace mat
episodes.description: The person removes the mat, cleans it thoroughly using cleaner, brush, water hose, towel, and vacuum, then returns and straightens it in the car.

e03004cc-80ce-4d82-9d09-f50fc82b6456.overall_goal: Prepare a work surface, handle the paint can, load a brush, and apply paint to a piece of wood.

episodes.name: Set up workspace
episodes.description: The person lays cardboard on the workbench and positions the wood on top.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Set up the grinder wheel and then grind/sharpen a chisel.

episodes.name: Initial lock setup
episodes.description: The person picks up a key, inserts it into the grinderâ€™s lock, and holds the grinder steady.

episodes.name: Install and secure wheel
episodes.description: The person positions the chisel on the grinding rest, mounts and aligns the wheel on the grinder, tightens it with a wrench, and uses the key and handle to lock/adjust the grinder.

episodes.name: Grind the chisel
episodes.description: The person holds the chisel at the rotating wheel, turns the handle, and files the chisel with the grinder wheel.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: turn, file

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Iron a piece of fabric, then check, fold, and move it to a table.

episodes.name: Prep and first iron
episodes.description: The person arranges the fabric on the ironing board, picks up the iron while stabilizing the fabric, performs an ironing pass, then lifts and sets the iron down.

episodes.name: Reposition and finish
episodes.description: The person releases and repositions the fabric on the board, irons again, checks by feeling, then folds the fabric and moves it to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare clothing and iron it on an ironing board using an iron, with intermittent adjustments and placements.

episodes.name: Garment setup and folding
episodes.description: The person lays out and adjusts clothing, briefly handles the iron, then folds items and places them on the board or in storage.

episodes.name: Ironing passes
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up the iron, presses and moves it across the shirt/short on the ironing board, adjusts fabric, and rests the iron on the table between passes.

e252c493-e587-403d-bd01-22713a1d5a57.overall_goal: Iron a shirt, stow the iron, and finish by folding the shirt.

episodes.name: Pick up iron
episodes.description: The person picks up the iron from the board using hand1.

episodes.name: Ironing and handling
episodes.description: The person holds the shirt, irons it, briefly stows the iron in a cabinet, then retrieves it to continue ironing and places it back on the board.

episodes.name: Transfer and fold
episodes.description: The person carries the shirt from the table to the board, places and adjusts it, then picks it up from the board and folds it with both hands.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Finish a piece of wood by painting, sanding, wiping, and opening a can using appropriate tools.

episodes.name: Paint wood
episodes.description: The person picks up a paintbrush with hand1, dips it into a can, holds the wood with hand2, paints the wood repeatedly, then puts down the brush and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Sand and wipe
episodes.description: The person picks up sandpaper with hand1 and holds the wood with hand2, sands the wood, then switches to a cloth to wipe it before putting the cloth down and releasing the wood.

episodes.name: Open can
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver with hand1 and the can with hand2, then opens the can using the screwdriver.

7da432dc-690a-49da-8f44-312c84494c75.overall_goal: Paint a rail with a brush, then secure the paint can and clean, dry, and store the brush.

episodes.name: Paint rail, open can
episodes.description: The person paints the rail with a brush, moving along and reloading the brush, then handles the paint can by setting it down and opening it.

episodes.name: Reload brush
episodes.description: The person dips the paintbrush into the paint and lifts it out to reload.

episodes.name: Close can, clean brush
episodes.description: The person sets down tools, closes the paint can, then rinses the brush in a water bucket and shakes off the water.

episodes.name: Dry and store brush
episodes.description: The person holds a cloth on the workbench, wipes water from the brush, and places the brush on the workbench.

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare dough pieces, set up a tray, load the oven, and brush the pieces with egg wash.

episodes.name: Dough prep and setup
episodes.description: The person shapes dough pieces, places them on a tray, cleans the workspace, positions the tray and oven, and cuts the dough using a cutter.

episodes.name: Release dough
episodes.description: The person releases the dough from the supporting hand.

episodes.name: Load oven, prep brush
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, loads the tray, closes it, sets the timer, and prepares a brush by dipping it in egg.

episodes.name: Apply egg wash
episodes.description: Holding the tray, the person brushes egg onto the dough pieces and then puts the brush down.

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare and dress dough for baking by staging, flouring, rolling, loading a tray into the oven, and spreading sauce.

episodes.name: Stage and roll dough
episodes.description: The person stages dough and a tray, dusts the dough with flour using a cutter, then rolls the dough with a roller while briefly holding it.

episodes.name: Load oven and prep sauce
episodes.description: They open the oven, carry and place the tray into it, then season and oil the dough, fetch a pot and spoon, and scoop sauce.

episodes.name: Spread sauce
episodes.description: The person repeatedly spreads sauce onto the dough with a spoon.

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare and process dough by mixing flour and water in a bowl, transferring it to a machine, and managing ingredients with a jug and scoop.

episodes.name: Set up ingredients
episodes.description: The person positions and opens the flour bag and readies a bowl.

3121a918-44a3-446a-b809-95e1b5766cb0.overall_goal: Clean and organize kitchenware by washing, drying, arranging, and storing items.

episodes.name: Store tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a tray, carries it to the cupboard, places it inside, and closes the cupboard door.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Set up, fuel, and operate a generator-powered watering system to water plants, then shut it off.

episodes.name: Setup generator and hose
episodes.description: The person activates the machine, manages the tank lid, and connects and adjusts a hose to the generator.

episodes.name: Fuel and water plants
episodes.description: The person connects a wire, prepares and pours fuel into the generator, then directs the hose to spray plants and finally turns the water off.

1f757b4c-032e-4012-a0f9-bb7c1a437612.overall_goal: Bundle and secure a hose with wire, tightening and finalizing the tie using hands and pliers at the workbench.

episodes.name: Wrap and tie hose
episodes.description: The person examines the hose, gathers hose and wire, wraps and ties the wire around the hose, tightens it, uses pliers to twist the wire, and sets the pliers down.

episodes.name: Check and secure
episodes.description: The person repositions the hose and wire, checks the wireâ€™s tightness, adjusts it, and secures the tie.

4fcddb9e-38ad-4948-acf6-dd76e87f7eb3.overall_goal: Service and install a bicycle wheel on a bike, including tightening/loosening fasteners, alignment checks, cleaning, and final inspection.

episodes.name: Tighten Wheel Screws
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, tightens the wheel screws, and returns the screwdriver to the toolbox.

39865b55-0b68-4cf9-a9fa-d55cfbc5909b.overall_goal: Assemble and secure engine components by installing the cover, checking alignment, and tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Cover installation and checks
episodes.description: The person inspects the engine, installs and screws down the cover, checks and adjusts alignment, tightens loose bolts with a wrench, attaches a nut and tightens it, then sets the wrench down.

episodes.name: Final fastener tightening
episodes.description: The person frees a hand from the nut, then uses a wrench and a screwdriver to tighten remaining fasteners on the engine and returns the tools to the workbench.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Retrieve bread from the oven, transfer it to a basket, then clean up and stow equipment.

episodes.name: Oven-to-basket transfer
episodes.description: The person sets up by moving a tray and basket to the table, opens the oven, uses a paddle to scoop bread from the oven, transfers the bread into the basket, and then places the paddle on the table.

episodes.name: Clean and stow
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush to sweep crumbs from the table, returns the tray to the oven and closes it, then arranges the bread in the basket and puts the spatula on the table.

72d27890-983d-48f8-8eed-7ca937424ca2.overall_goal: Remove a plant using a rope, then tidy the rope and finish by uprooting a weed.

episodes.name: Tie and Tighten
episodes.description: The person picks up a rope, ties it around the plant, tightens it by pulling, holds the rope, pulls the plant, and loosens the surrounding soil.

episodes.name: Extract and Cleanup
episodes.description: The person releases a hand from the rope, pulls the plant out and places it down, unties and coils the rope and stores it, then performs final adjustments and uproots a weed.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare a piece of wood on a workbench by cutting, measuring, drilling, and fastening a screw, then reposition the wood and remove tape.

episodes.name: Prepare and fasten
episodes.description: The person cuts, measures, drills, marks the wood, inserts a screw, and tightens it using various tools.

episodes.name: Reposition and clean
episodes.description: The person releases and re-places the wood on the workbench, holds it, removes tape, and sets the tape down.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Refurbish a railing by painting, tightening hardware, cleaning, then wiping and inspecting it.

episodes.name: Paint and Service
episodes.description: The person paints the railing, repositions a chair, tightens a bolt with a screwdriver, and cleans the railing with a brush, putting down and picking up tools as needed.

episodes.name: Wipe and Inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the railing, and inspects the result.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Seal a container with its lid and secure it with tape.

episodes.name: Lid Sealing Tape Prep
episodes.description: The person wipes the container, places items, aligns and secures the lid, then picks up tools and cuts a piece of tape.

episodes.name: Tape Application Finish
episodes.description: The person sets the tools on the table, applies tape around the lidâ€™s edge, smoothens it, and checks the attachment.

3619f6fe-9722-4e98-ac1a-372821f1ec78.overall_goal: Load and organize various items in the car by placing belongings into the trunk, compartments, and glove box.

episodes.name: Load bag into trunk
episodes.description: The person opens the trunk, picks up a bag, and places it into the trunk using both hands.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew fabric by threading a needle, stitching and tightening, then trimming and finishing the fabric on a workbench.

episodes.name: Initial stitching
episodes.description: The person picks up needle and thread, sews through the fabric, pulls and tightens the thread, then sets needle and thread on the workbench.

episodes.name: Trim and finalize
episodes.description: The person uses scissors to cut thread, manages and rethreads it, examines and adjusts the fabric, trims excess thread, then smoothens the fabric on the workbench.

39653b45-9792-4ef2-bc6b-945431870ce3.overall_goal: Create and finish knitted fabric by forming loops, managing tension, and trimming the yarn.

episodes.name: Form stitch loop
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and needle, inserts the needle, wraps and pulls the yarn to create and tighten a loop, adjusts it, and puts the needle down.

episodes.name: Trim and knit
episodes.description: The person releases the yarn, uses scissors to cut the end, inspects the fabric, then continues knitting loops while pulling, tightening, checking tension, holding materials, and making final adjustments.

0da6e15a-d33b-4a61-bfce-1fb28d893637.overall_goal: Form crochet stitches by looping and pulling yarn with a crochet hook while managing yarn tension.

episodes.name: Setup and first stitch
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and hook, adjusts tension, forms and tightens an initial loop, then places the hook and releases the yarn.

episodes.name: Repeated crocheting
episodes.description: The person repeatedly crochets by wrapping yarn on the hook, pulling through loops, placing or picking up the hook as needed, and tightening or loosening stitches for tension control.

f8442573-f48f-4f2b-9f22-b208f916aa63.overall_goal: Clean and organize a garden hose, tidy nearby debris, then roll and hang the hose neatly on a hanger.

episodes.name: Stabilize hose
episodes.description: The person holds the hose steady with the second hand.

episodes.name: Wipe hose with rag
episodes.description: The person picks up a rag, cleans the hose, then sets the rag down before picking it up again and putting it away.

episodes.name: Tidy and store hose
episodes.description: The person removes debris into a bin, picks up and untangles the hose, stretches and organizes it, rolls it up, carries it to a hanger, places it on the hanger, and adjusts it.

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Wash and dry a car using a rag, bucket, and hose.

episodes.name: Spot touch-up
episodes.description: The person picks up a rag, wipes remaining spots, and sets the rag down.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a wooden surface by brushing, oiling, sanding, and wiping.

episodes.name: Brush and handle
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, holds the wood, brushes the wood and a leaf using the brush, then puts the brush down and releases the leaf.

episodes.name: Oil, sand, wipe
episodes.description: The person applies oil to the wood, sands it with sandpaper, and wipes it with a cloth, picking up and putting down each tool with hand1.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: release

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, apply, put-down, sand, wipe

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare dough strips by rolling and pan-cooking them, then cutting and separating portions while tidying the workspace.

episodes.name: Cook and prep dough
episodes.description: The person rolls dough, cooks dough-strips in a pan on the stove, flips and plates them, then kneads and sprinkles flour on dough, cleans the table, and puts away tools.

episodes.name: Cut and separate
episodes.description: The person cuts dough with a cutter, sets it down, picks up a scraper, separates dough-strips, and places the scraper on the table.

6287465a-ef00-49db-b730-1e1c22e77790.overall_goal: Clean the floor by sweeping dust into a dustpan and disposing it in a bin.

episodes.name: Stow tools
episodes.description: The person picks up the broom and dustpan and places them in the storage area.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare and secure wiring on a socket, then insert a cable into the socket.

episodes.name: Wire setup and securing
episodes.description: The person routes a wire through the socket, fastens it with tools, insulates the connection, and trims the wire, placing tools aside between steps.

episodes.name: Cable insertion
episodes.description: The person picks up a cable and a socket, then inserts the cable into the socket.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare nut-filled cracker sandwiches by peeling nuts, assembling them between crackers, and plating.

episodes.name: Arrange crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers on a plate using both hands.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Clean a keg with water, move it between locations, and manage its lid.

episodes.name: Rinse Keg Setup
episodes.description: The person fetches water with a cup, pours it into the keg, operates the faucet and hose, rinses the keg inside and outside, then shuts off and releases the faucet.

episodes.name: Stow Hose, Shelf Move
episodes.description: The person puts down the hose, then picks up the keg, carries it to a shelf, and places it there.

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Collect soil with a trowel, transfer and mix it in a container, then seal and shake the container.

episodes.name: Initial grasp
episodes.description: The person picks up a trowel with one hand and holds the container with the other to prepare for soil collection.

episodes.name: Collect and mix soil
episodes.description: The person collects soil from a bucket with a trowel, pours it into the container, stirs the contents, then sets down the trowel, positions the container on the ground, and removes the lid.

episodes.name: Inspect seal shake
episodes.description: The person holds and inspects the mixture, sets the container down, replaces and closes the lid, then picks up and shakes the container.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Assemble and later disassemble a bicycle wheel and tire on a workbench using hand tools.

episodes.name: Initial setup and glue
episodes.description: The person moves the bicycle to the workbench, attaches the wheel and inserts a bolt, then applies glue to the tire and sets the glue down.

episodes.name: Mount and tighten
episodes.description: The person prepares the tire with a cloth, mounts it onto the wheel, uses a screwdriver to fit it, then tightens the bolt with a wrench.

episodes.name: Remove wheel and tire
episodes.description: The person loosens and removes the bolt, takes the wheel off the bicycle, places it on the workbench, then loosens and removes the tire from the wheel using tools from the toolbox.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, remove

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle and scooter, including tire handling, inspection, tightening, cleaning, and fastener removal using various tools.

episodes.name: Remove and refit tyre
episodes.description: The person lifts the tyre, removes it from the motorcycle, places it on the floor, then picks it up and fits it back onto the motorcycle.

episodes.name: Check and tighten
episodes.description: After checking the scooter, the person tightens a screw on the scooter with a spanner and a bolt with a wrench, setting the tools down afterward.

episodes.name: Clean and disassemble
episodes.description: The person inspects the motorcycle, wipes off grease with a cloth, then unscrews, loosens, and removes fasteners from the motorcycle and scooter using wrench, spanner, and screwdriver, placing tools and parts on the workbench.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: inspect, pick-up, wipe-off, place, unscrew, put-down, loosen, remove

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Install two ceiling holders by using a screwdriver while repositioning a ladder between locations.

episodes.name: Install first holder
episodes.description: The person takes a screwdriver and holder from a pocket, holds the holder to the ceiling, fixes it with the screwdriver, and then releases it.

episodes.name: Relocate and install
episodes.description: The person stows the screwdriver, climbs down, moves and places the ladder to a new location, pockets another holder, climbs, retrieves the screwdriver and holder from the pocket, holds the holder to the ceiling, fixes it, and releases it.

episodes.name: Stow screwdriver
episodes.description: The person puts the screwdriver back into the pocket.

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Prune vines and a plant, dispose of cuttings in a bin, and tie the plant using rope.

episodes.name: Gather gear
episodes.description: The person picks up a pruner and rope from storage and then returns the pruner to the pack.

episodes.name: Prune and tie
episodes.description: The person holds and cuts vines, carries and puts them into a bin, puts down and picks up tools as needed, then cuts and ties a plant with rope before pulling it out.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Tend the garden by weeding, pruning vines, raking grass, and watering plants.

episodes.name: Pull weed
episodes.description: The person pulls out a weed, holds it, and places it on the ground.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Organize papers on a table by arranging sheets, extracting pages from a booklet, and handling/opening the booklet.

episodes.name: Organize papers and booklet
episodes.description: The person picks up, adjusts, and places papers on the table, arranges them, pulls pages from a booklet and places them on the table, then puts down, picks up, and opens the booklet.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Remove, reinstall, and secure a bicycle pedal and its nut.

episodes.name: Initial pedal check
episodes.description: The person tests and moves the bicycle pedal using both hands.

episodes.name: Approach bicycle
episodes.description: The person moves toward the bicycle to begin service.

episodes.name: Service pedal assembly
episodes.description: The person uses a spanner to loosen and remove the pedal, sets parts down, reinstalls and tightens the pedal, then services the nut with pliers and secures it.

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: The person organizes books by picking them from a heap and table, examining them, staging some on the table, and placing them onto a bookshelf.

episodes.name: Initial shelving run
episodes.description: The person picks up books from the heap and table, examines them, and places them on the bookshelf using hand1.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Prepare and use a book and a guitar for practice by handling the book, tuning the guitar, setting the book on a stand, and reading.

episodes.name: Book preparation
episodes.description: The person picks up, opens, flips through, marks, and reads the book.

episodes.name: Guitar tuning setup
episodes.description: The person picks up and releases the guitar, adjusts/tightens/tests the strings, holds the guitar, places the book on a stand, adjusts the stand and book, and reads.
